data.name: XExternalSheetCache
desc: Primary interface for the com.sun.star.sheet.ExternalSheetCache service.

methods.name: getAllColumns
desc: Given a row number, this method returns a list of all columns numbers that store cached cell values in that row.
The column numbers are sorted in ascending order.

methods.name: getAllRows
desc: It returns a list of all row numbers where a cached cell or cells exist.
The row numbers are sorted in ascending order.

methods.name: getCellValue
desc: It retrieves a cached value from a specified cell position.
The cached value can be either string or double.

methods.name: setCellValue
desc: It sets a cached value for a specified cell position.
The value is expected to be either of type string or of type double. No other data types are supported.

properties.name: TokenIndex
desc: Index corresponding to this instance of an external sheet cache for usage in formula tokens.
This index to the external sheet cache is expected in the SingleReference.Sheet member if it is part of an external reference token.
Each external sheet cache has a unique index value inside the ExternalDocLink instance.
